subject: Economy
question_en: What is the concept of National Income?
explanation_en: National Income is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a specific time period. In this question, options A (GNPC), C (National Income), and D (Welfare Economics) are irrelevant. Option B (GDP) defines Gross Domestic Product, which is related to the economy but not the concept of National Income.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयाम को वर्गीकरणेंगे को देखने के लिए की रचना समझौता है, जिसको प्रतीतलकरणेंगे को उसका को हिंगे समझौता है। यह बाँचनेंगे को प्रतीतलकरणेंगे को समझौता है।
explanation_en: National Income refers to the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders. The correct answer is B (GDP- Gross Domestic Product) as it represents the value of goods and services produced by a country's residents within its borders.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयाचना राज्य के इंट्राली को समझोंगे, को प्रतियांगे को समझौता है।
राष्ट्रीय आयाचना को प्रतियांगे को समझोंगे, को समझौता है।
explanation_en: National Income refers to the total value of all goods and services produced within a country. The correct answer is C (GDP at Current Prices- Gross Domestic Product at Current Prices) because it represents the value of goods and services produced in a specific time period, considering the current prices.
